rules_text:
{3}{U}, Discard Bleeding Dunes: Draw a card. Create a 4/3 blue and red Sand Shark creature token with prowess.
At the beginning of each end step, if you cast a noncreature spell this turn, add a 4/3 blue and red Sand Shark creature token with prowess to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead put one into play from your bestiary.)[/i]
